title: Broken dependency: "state" depends on non-existent field
explanation: Field "state" declares dependency on parent "region", but no field named "region" exists in step "Account Setup". This will cause runtime errors when trying to establish the dependency relationship. The dependent field will never enable.
fixGuidance: Add the missing parent field "region" to this step
Fix typo: check if parent field has different name (common: "country" vs "countries")
Remove dependency if not needed: delete "dependency" property from "state"

title: Field "email" has email validation but type is "text"
explanation: Field "email" has validation.email=true but type="text". This mismatch means: (1) Browser won't show email keyboard on mobile, (2) Autocomplete won't suggest emails, (3) Pattern validation may conflict. Best practice is to match field type with validation rules.
fixGuidance: Change field type to "email": "type": "email" for proper mobile keyboard and validation
If type must be "text", remove email validation and use pattern: "^[^@]+@[^@]+\.[^@]+$"
